name: Quadratic puzzle 5
description: Game introductionThe gameplay is a traditional jigsaw puzzle, which requires splicing the disrupted pieces into a complete image. Every time you complete it, your fastest completion time will be recorded, come and challenge your limit speed!Featured ContentEvery time a puzzle is completed, images of beautiful girls with different personalities will be presented. Full-time one-handed mode, perfect for playing at leisure. A total of 25 levels, each level is a different beautiful girl image waiting for you to unlock! 5 different puzzle modes. You can use "w,a,s,d" and the mouse wheel to control the viewing angle of the image.
